meanings.meaning: a training programme for new staff

vlive.korean: [신입사원으로 나타났다!] [came back as our new employee!] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 회사에서 연애하면 어떨까?! [우웅우웅2] 12월 24일 첫방송!
[분노] 아니 쟤 신입사원이 왜 저러는 거야? [Furious] What's up with that newbie? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
[라떼는 말이야] - 윤 차장님께서 - 근데 신입사원... [When I was your age] - Manager Yoon. - You're new. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: [When I was your age] - Manager Yoon. - You're new.

vlive.korean: [Latte is horse] - 지금 노동법에... - 신입사원이 그렇게! 어?! [Latte is horse] - This is... the labor law... - You're new! But you are! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: [Latte is horse] - This is... the labor law... - You're new! But you are!

vlive.korean: 신입생이 아니라고요? You're not a freshman? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong sewoon X LieV - 정세운의 눕방라이브!

examples.korean: The club welcomes all new members regardless of age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 본 클럽에서는 나이에 상관없이 모든 신입 회원들을 환영합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I’ve budgeted for two new members of staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 신입 직원 두 명에 대한 예산을 세워 놓았어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve budgeted for two new members of staff. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: New members will be issued with a temporary identity card. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 신입 회원들에게는 임시 신분증이 발급된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: New members will be issued with a temporary identity card. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: For months there was a veto on employing new staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 몇 달 동안 신입 직원 채용이 금지되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: For months there was a veto on employing new staff. Add to Wordbook
